useCase.name: Generate Fault Management Report
useCase.description: As a Buyer/Client, I want to generate a Fault Management Report.

preconditions.precondition: The Buyer/Client has the necessary permissions.

successEndConditions.condition: The Fault Management Report is successfully generated.

useCase.trigger: Buyer/Client initiates the request to generate a Fault Management Report.

mainSequence.step: Buyer/Client sends a POST request to create a Fault Management Job.
Fault Management Job is successfully created.
Fault Management Job enters the inProgress state.
Fault Management Job causes the creation of a Fault Management Report.
Fault Management Report enters the inProgress state.
Fault Management Report completes the data collection.
Fault Management Report is successfully completed.
Fault Management Job is marked as completed.
Buyer/Client sends a GET request to retrieve the Fault Management Report.
Fault Management Report content is delivered to the Buyer/Client.
